text: oba maligavata ætulu vanu yæyi æyata kiyanu læbiya. æya eya dutu vita jalayen pirunu tatakayak yæyi situvaya. æya æyage vastraya æyage kendayen ivatata (osava) gattaya. niyata vasayenma meya palinguvalin musu vu maligavak yæyi ohu (suleyiman) pævasiya. mage paramadhipatiyaneni, niyata vasayenma mama mata ma aparadha kara gattemi. tavada mama suleyiman samaga sarva lokayanhi himipanan vu allahta avanata vuyemi yæyi æya pævasuvaya
